mapper.update: update lg_receipt set orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiptCount = #{receiptcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiptVolume = #{receiptvolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, receiptWeight = #{receiptweight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, cargoAmount = #{cargoamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cargoDeduction = #{cargodeduction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, serviceDeduction = #{servicededuction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, receiptNote = #{receiptnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returnDate = #{returndate,jdbcType=DATE}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where receiptId = #{receiptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select receiptId, orderId, receiptCount, receiptVolume, receiptWeight, cargoAmount, cargoDeduction, serviceDeduction, receiptNote, returnDate, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_receipt where receiptId = #{receiptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select receiptId, orderId, receiptCount, receiptVolume, receiptWeight, cargoAmount, cargoDeduction, serviceDeduction, receiptNote, returnDate, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_receipt
